memberdef.argsstring: (const SigningProvider &provider, const CScript &fromPubKey, CMutableTransaction &txTo, unsigned int nIn, const CAmount &amount, int nHashType, SignatureData &sig_data)
memberdef.name: SignSignature

detaileddescription.para: Produce a satisfying script (scriptSig or witness).

parameterdescription.para: Utility containing the information necessary to solve a script.
The script to produce a satisfaction for.
The index of the input in txTo referring the output being spent.
The value of the output being spent.
Additional data provided to solve a script. Filled with the resulting satisfying script and whether the satisfaction is complete.

simplesect.para: True if the produced script is entirely satisfying fromPubKey.

memberdef.argsstring: (const SigningProvider &provider, const CTransaction &txFrom, CMutableTransaction &txTo, unsigned int nIn, int nHashType, SignatureData &sig_data)
memberdef.name: SignSignature
